thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: Marilyn and Don Ross
thread.title_full: Exceptional Villas reviewed by Marilyn and Don Ross

author: Marilyn and Don Ross
title: Marilyn and Don Ross
text: Our Antiguan holiday was a great success. AIne and Noreen played a part in accomplishing this, from restaurant bookings, airport transfers and service. Very well done. Lovely to work with (even with the time difference!). Would definitely recommend this easy way to book a holiday. Many thanks.
